sentences.en: A pool of mercury surrounds the negative electrode.
Each electrode is impregnated with a catalyst to speed the oxidation reduction or half reaction.
sentences.cn: 每个电极掺入催化剂,以加重电池半氧化或还原反应.

sentences.en: Each half reaction responds to the interfacial potential at the corresponding electrode.
sentences.cn: 每个半反应都与相应电极上的界面电势差相呼应.

sentences.en: Electrode effects, which are always a hindrance when the Dipole - Dipole array is used.
sentences.cn: 电极效应在用偶极 - 偶极排列时是经常遇到的一种干扰因素.

sentences.en: Experience shows that the positive electrode always burns away more rapidly than the negative.
sentences.cn: 经验表明,正电极比负电极烧蚀得快得多.

sentences.en: In discussing cells, one calls the electrode at which reductions occur the cathode.
sentences.cn: 在所讨论的电池中, 在其上发生还原作用的电极叫做阴极.

sentences.en: In this case, a flow of electrons from electrode to solution occurs.
sentences.cn: 这样, 就发生从电极到溶液的电子流动.

sentences.en: Ion selective electrode analysis of fluoride in deluted chromating solution is described.
sentences.cn: 阐述用氟离子选择电极测定低铬钝化液中的氟的方法.

sentences.en: Membrane electrode assembly ( MEA ) is the key component of DMFC.
sentences.cn: 膜电极 ( MEA ) 是直接甲醇燃料电池(DMFC)的核心部件.

sentences.en: The electrolyte within the glass electrode is an acid solution of definite strength.
sentences.cn: 玻璃电极中的电解质是具有一定浓度的酸溶液.

sentences.en: The inert electrode used for polarographic analysis is usually a dropping mercury electrode.
sentences.cn: 极谱分析通常用滴汞电极作为惰性电极.

sentences.en: The metal with the greater single - electrode potential will sacrifice itself to protect the other.
sentences.cn: 具有较大单电极电位的金属为保护另一种金属,自身将不断消耗.

sentences.en: The monkeys have electrodes implanted into the brain to measure their brain activity.
sentences.cn: 这些猴子的脑中植入了电极，以监测其大脑活动。

sentences.en: Therefore, any changes in the cell are ascribable to the working electrode.
sentences.cn: 因此, 电池中的任何变化,都归因于工作电极.

sentences.en: We have the saturated calomel electrode.
sentences.cn: 我们得到饱和甘汞电极.

sentences.en: With the result the coating projects beyond the molten end of the electrode metal.
sentences.cn: 结果药皮伸延于焊条金属芯熔端之外.

phrases.tran_cn: 被覆焊条；带焊皮焊条；涂药电焊条
[机]铂电极；铂丝电极；白金电极
不锈钢焊条；不锈纲电焊支

trans.tran_en: a small piece of metal or a wire that is used to send electricity through a system or through a person’s body
